customer_name: Carol Bacon, John Hardisty and Tammy Hardisty
site_name: Carol Bacon John Hardisty and Tammy Hardisty

citations.narrative:
No records of disposition were available at the time of the inspection for three zebus that had been sold by the facility.
Failure to maintain these required records prevents the tracking of animals to their destination. The facility must ensure
that records are maintained which fully and correctly disclose all information concerning each animal which has been
transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed as required under this Section of the Regulations. Correct by
February 3, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
